info.title: Groundwater Accounting Platform API
info.description: Before you start using the Groundwater Accounting Platform API, you will need to obtain an API key from the project team. The Groundwater Accounting Platform REST API provides resource-oriented urls to fetch data as JSON.

get.description: List all parcels for a specified geography
List all parcels as a feature collection (GeoJSON) for a specified geography

get.summary: List by Geography and Water Account ID
get.description: List all parcels for a specified geography and water account
Search for Parcels by APN within a given {geographyID}.  Returns Parcels that have parcel numbers that start with the {parcelNumber} field (minimum 3 characters to search), including geometry
List all reporting periods for a specified geography
List all usage locations for a specified geography and year
List all usage locations as a feature collection (GeoJSON) for a specified geography and year
List all water accounts for a specified geography

get.summary: List by Geography, Year, and Type
get.description: List all water measurements for a specified geography, year, and water measurement type
List all water measurements for a specified geography and parcel
List all water measurement types for a specified geography
List all wells for a specified geography
List all wells as a feature collection (GeoJSON) for a specified geography
List all meter readings for a specified well
